resources.string: "The best photos and video scenes automatically combined for you. "
Touch it to make changes, save or share.
"This may take a moment, we will notify you when it's ready to share."
"This may take a moment, we will notify you when it's ready."
When people are present, Highlight Reel can customize movies using the faces from your photos and videos.

Find photos and create albums faster with tagging and automatic recognition of friends in your photos . These tags will not be shared on any social network, and you can turn this off in settings at any time.
Do you want to share it?
This song uses %s of storage. Would you like to continue? Data plan charges may occur.
These songs use %s of storage. Would you like to continue? Data plan charges may occur.
Do you want to save a new version, or replace the existing Highlight Reel?
Not enough photos and videos to create a Highlight Reel.
An unknown error occurred while preparing your movie.
Can not save movie %s because there is not enough space on the device.
The device is currently busy, cannot produce Highlight Reel at this time. Try again later.
Another Highlight Reel is exporting, you can not modify or save a Highlight Reel util it complete.
Unable to create another Highlight Reel while previous Highlight Reel is saving.
Too many photos/videos to create a Highlight Reel.
We are assembling your photos and videos and will notify you when the preview is ready.
Your highlight reel is ready to view. You can also customize the length, music, and select what photos & videos you want to include.
Combine your best photos from an event and automatically create a movie that you can share with your family and friends.
Highlight Reels are auto generated for you! Just touch to view and customize.
Change the length, title, soundtrack or photos and video clips just the way you like it.
"You will be notified when there are new Highlight Reels available."

"By turning on the Camera location, your photos and videos will be better organized in Gallery.
You can always change this in Camera settings."
Please turn on GPS in Settings to enable Geo-Tagging.
Touch any title to view all photos and videos from that event.
"Any item you don't choose will be deleted."
"We've found a better moment in time for this photo. Use this button to see our best shot!"
"We've found a better moment in time for this photo. Use this button to see our suggestion!"
Gallery needs to clear temporary storage to improve performance.
"Choose one or more faces of the same person"
Choose more faces of %s to add to this group
Remove the selected photos from this tag?
Remove the selected photo from this tag?
Your photos will be grouped by this tag.
Removing this group will remove the tags but not delete the photos.
"Only you see tags. Photos aren’t automatically shared to social networks."
Faces will be recognised in your photos
"Your photos will be grouped by person and will be updated as you take more."
"Quickly find people in your photos and create Highlight Reels to save and share."
We are gathering your photos and videos. This may take up to one minute.
Automatic recognition of friends in your photos and videos. These tags will not be shared on any social network.
Turning off Face Recognition will remove all of the people tags you have created.
At least one picture is required
Do you want to exit the current edit?
"We are gathering faces from your photos intelligently."
Do you want to view it?
Only support JPG and PNG format
No se puede editar el original
No se ha podido descargar la foto porque la red no está disponible.
La imagen exportada será una copia y no incluirá el historial.
Hay cambios sin guardar en esta imagen.
Network error and streaming video stopped.
Network connection failed,please check your network connection.
Error occurs,the video cannot be trimmed.
No application available to print the file(s).
Setup and manage RTSP proxy settings
Setup and manage HTTP proxy settings
"SIM's Data Connectivity is closed, cann't set APN"
Set Max and Min Port Number
Reconnect the server to play the video or not?
Set HTTP buffer size for streaming
Set RTSP buffer size for streaming
Swipe left or right to view multi-angle image
\"%s\" is not supported for 3D image. It will be converted to 2D.
Swipe left or right to view 3D panorama image.
This is 3D image. To continue sharing, it will be converted to 2D.
Selected images include 3D images. To continue sharing, they will be converted to 2D.
This is 3D image. The recipient may not be able to view it properly.
Selected images include 3D images. The recipient may not be able to view them properly.
You can adjust the depth manually in menu if your eyes feel uncomfortable
At least %1$s photos are required to compose the effect.
At most %1$s photos can be selected.
All copy-protected content will be hidden when Wi-Fi Display is connected.
Cannot open it while wireless display is on.
To see it on the phone,
please unplug your phone from Smartbook.
Not support 4K video when Wireless display is connected. Disconnect it and enjoy the 4K video playing?
Bluetooth headset cannot play the sound of the 4K video.Disconnect it and enjoy the 4K video playing?
MHL cannot play the 4K video. Disconnect it and enjoy the 4K video playing?
HDMI cannot play the 4K video. Disconnect it and enjoy the 4K video playing?
External output cannot play the 4K video. Disconnect it and enjoy the 4K video playing?
The storage does not have enough space.
All copy-protected content will be hidden when HDMI Display is connected.
Memory card full or no memory card.
HotKnot is OFF. Please turn on HotKnot in Settings
Please use screen to touch another device.
%1$s has no available DRM license. You can press Renew button to acquire DRM license.
Some protected files cannot be forwarded.
You could not use DRM protected files. Please make sure data connection is available.
Your action will consume DRM rights.
One or more protected files cannot be forwarded.
Establecer papel tapiz de la pantalla de bloqueo
Permitir que la dirección de rotación de las fotos se controle automáticamente en el álbum
The storage space is full or there is no storage card
Map software has not been installed
Click the album to switch the display rules!
Photos from %d album(s) have been hidden
No photos to display at the moment
The timeline only displays photos in \"Visible Albums\".Click to enter the \"Folder\" mode (or Settings) to set visible albums!
This picture has been added with a watermark
This image under 50 KB is already hidden. Hide feature can be turned off in Settings.
Cropped images under 50 KB are already hidden. Hide feature can be turned off in Settings.
Do not display images under 50 KB
Go to photo directory first when app is launched
Move the selected items to the album?
Move the selected item to the album?
Failed to request the storage permisstion.
Do you want to reset the effect?
No se puede cargar la imagen.
Error al guardar la imagen recortada
No se ha podido encontrar el elemento.
Procesando solicitudes de almacenamiento en caché
No se puede silenciar el vídeo.
No se puede reproducir el vídeo.
No se ha podido identificar algunas ubicaciones debido a errores en la red.
No se ha podido descargar las fotos del álbum. Inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
La imagen recortada se ha guardado en %s.
No hay imágenes ni vídeos disponibles.
El elemento se ha almacenado de forma local y está disponible sin conexión.
Toca aquí para realizar la importación.
No se puede recortar: el vídeo de destino es demasiado corto.
No hay contenido disponible para importar en este dispositivo.
No se puede acceder a la cámara.
Se ha inhabilitado la cámara debido a las políticas de seguridad.
Para poder usar la cámara, inserta una tarjeta SD.
No se ha podido acceder a la tarjeta SD.
No se puede seleccionar en el modo de escena.
No queda espacio en la tarjeta SD. Cambia la configuración de calidad o elimina algunas imágenes u otros archivos.
Se ha alcanzado el límite de tamaño.
"Desactiva el dispositivo. Deja de usarlo durante unos minutos."
Toca para hacer una foto mientras grabas un vídeo.
Se ha iniciado la grabación de vídeo.
La grabación de vídeo se ha detenido.
La instantánea de vídeo se inhabilita al activar efectos especiales.
Opción de cámara trasera y delantera
Barra de tiempo del reproductor de vídeo
El intervalo de tiempo está desactivado. Activa esta función para establecer un intervalo.
El temporizador de cuenta atrás está desactivado. Activa esta opción para ver la cuenta atrás antes de hacer una foto.
Cuenta atrás para hacer una foto

"Etiqueta tus fotos y vídeos con las ubicaciones donde se han realizado.
Otras aplicaciones pueden acceder a esta información, así como a las imágenes guardadas."
